buddy_profile.name: Delphine Pernot
buddy_profile.title: Circular Economy Expert
buddy_profile.introduction: Over the past ten years, I have gradually developed my expertise to put my convictions into action, focusing my energy in increasing circularity. I have been passionately involved in collaborating with private companies and public authorities to advance circular economy initiatives and implement Extended Producer Responsibility (EPR) Schemes. I played instrumental roles in developing and implementing strategic roadmaps to establish EPR schemes dedicated to industrial and commercial packaging in France. My motivation is to work among various stakeholders and to help shift an industry as a whole, and to re-invent economy with more re-use and more re-cycling.

specialization.achievement: Instrumental roles in developing and implementing strategic roadmaps for EPR schemes dedicated to industrial and commercial packaging in France
specialization.motivation: Help shift entire industries and re-invent economy with more re-use and re-cycling

top_3_advice: Use a pragmatic approach and don't be afraid to get your hands dirty
buddy_profile.how_to_help: I am willing to share my energy and my motivation to bring together corporate world to work on a more sustainable future by implementing circular economy principles.
buddy_profile.sustainability_motivation: Sustainable development has motivated my professional activity from the start. I believe that the only possible way is to re-invent economy taking into account the environment and social pillars. During my 8 years' experience as a sustainable consultant for Deloitte, I have discover the concept of Circular economy that completely make sense for me: resource efficiency, life cycle approach but also proximity, transparency, solidarity and global partnership. So after consulting missions for private and institutional clients on sustainable development, I specialized in the challenges of recycling and reuse, as well as Extended Producer Responsibility challenges.
buddy_profile.deloitte_experience: 8 years as sustainable consultant for Deloitte
buddy_profile.professional_approach: I like working on both strategic thinking and operational challenges, to make waste a resource.
